title: HAP 69 - The Best We Have - The American Negro Academy
itunes:title: HAP 69 - The Best We Have - The American Negro Academy
description: The ANA unites leading African American scholars of the early 20th century, including W.E.B. Du Bois, Paul Laurence Dunbar, William Ferris, Archibald Grimké, and Kelly Miller.
content:encoded: The ANA unites leading African American scholars of the early 20th century, including W.E.B. Du Bois, Paul Laurence Dunbar, William Ferris, Archibald Grimké, and Kelly Miller.

itunes:author: Peter Adamson, Jonardon Ganeri, Chike Jeffers
